metadata.title: CVE-2024-48910 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: DOMPurify is a DOM-only, super-fast, uber-tolerant XSS sanitizer for HTML,MathML and SVG. DOMPurify was vulnerable to prototype pollution. Thisvulnerability is fixed in 2.4.2.

criterions.comment: node-dompurify package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
